elements.name: panel1
elements.title: How can you proceed in the following situations to get one step further?

elements.name: question2
elements.title: If you have lost a customer in conversation.
elements.correctAnswer: Actively approach the customer: I have the feeling that I haven't quite convinced you yet. Can I help you with further information to help you decide?

elements.name: question3
elements.title: If the customer does not complete the sale.
elements.correctAnswer:
Possible approaches:
I suspect that I have not yet addressed a particular point that concerns you - what is it? Or: Excuse me, please. I seem to have overlooked something in the presentation due to my enthusiasm for this offer. What brings you to this statement?
Or: What is missing so that you can say "yes"?

elements.name: question4
elements.title: If the other party does not agree.
elements.correctAnswer: Try to put yourself in your conversation partner's shoes: What would it have to be like for her to agree to the matter in principle?

elements.name: question5
elements.title: If the person you are talking to is not interested in the matter.
elements.correctAnswer: Actively address the lack of interest: What would it take for you to be fundamentally interested in this topic?
